name: Along The Void
description:
Description

Along The Void is a fast-paced 2D jump 'n' run set in an alien world that has been stripped of its colors. By switching between different colors, the player can affect the environment and hop from one floating space island to the next. Beat high scores from you and your local friends!

"Along The Void" is a project produced by 8 students from the Games Academy in 29 days. It is free, so make sure you grab it!

Gameplay Controls ActionsKeyboardX-Box ControllerMoveLeftALeftStick or CrossLeftMoveRightDLeftStick or CrossRightGravityControlSLBColor Switch◄, ►, ▲, ▼A, B, Y, XDashLeft ShiftRBFairyControllFR3FairyMovementW, A, S, DRightStickFairyCallbackGRTCameraZoomQLTResetPositionRSelectPauseMenuEscStart Specs

Genre:    Platformer, Jump 'n' Run

Engine:    Unity

Camera perspective:    2D

ArtStyle:    dark and cute, cartoonish, slimy and mushroomy

Platform:    PC

Controls:    Keyboard/Controller

How to Install:
  • Download Zip File
  • Unpack Zip File
  • Start Along The Void.exe
Minimum Recommended System Requirements CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4210U CPU @ 1.70GHz 2.40GHz RAM: 3,00 - 4,00 GB DDR3 Systemtype: 64-Bit Windows 8 and above (or hardware thats similar or higher) Links:
